sentences.en: He was purified from [ of ] all sins.
sentences.cn: 他的一切罪恶都被 洗涤 了.

sentences.en: In the pilot experiment of separation of purified brine with Gore membrane, we study the quality of brine treatment and brine purification as well as cleaning technology of Gore membrane scaling.
sentences.cn: 在戈尔膜分离净化卤水的中试过程中，我们对卤水处理与卤水精制的质量、膜结垢的清洗技术进行了研究。

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the effectiveness of microorganism elimination by routine purified technology of water plants in Shenzhen.
sentences.cn: 目的调查分析深圳区镇水厂常规水处理工艺去除微生物的净化效果。

sentences.en: Only when putting these measures into practice, will our society be purified into a paradise for us to live in.
sentences.cn: 只有把这些措施付诸实践，我们的社会才会被净化成一个居住的天堂。

sentences.en: Solubilization is required of any protein to be purified.
sentences.cn: 增溶溶解对于任何要纯化的蛋白质都是必需的.

sentences.en: The air in the room was purified.
sentences.cn: 房间的空气得到了净化.

sentences.en: The cells were purified from brain tissue that would normally have been discarded.
sentences.cn: 由脑组织纯化出的细胞,可以是在常规情况下丢弃的脑组织.

sentences.en: The enzyme has been partially purified from muny bean shoots.
sentences.cn: 从绿豆幼苗中已部分地提纯了这种酶.

sentences.en: The polyglucose units are purified and cross - linked.
sentences.cn: 各种多聚葡萄糖单位被纯化并交联.

sentences.en: These metals may be purified by a technique called zone refining.
sentences.cn: 这些金属可以用所谓“逐区提纯法”来提纯.

sentences.en: This salt has been purified for use in medicine.
sentences.cn: 这种盐已经提纯以供药用.

sentences.en: Water can be purified by boiling for five minutes.
sentences.cn: 水煮沸5分钟便可得到净化。

sentences.en: Water can be purified by filtration through sand.
Water in this area has been purified of undesirable chemicals.
sentences.cn: 这个地区水中的不良化学物质已清除掉了.

sentences.en: Water is purified by passing through rock.
sentences.cn: 水在穿透岩石的过程中获得了净化.

sentences.en: When highly purified, the red - absorbing form of the pigment is blue - green.
sentences.cn: 如果高度提纯, 这种色素的红光吸收型是蓝绿色的.

words.tran_cn: 纯的；纯粹的；纯洁的；清白的；纯理论的
纯粹地；仅仅，只不过；完全地；贞淑地；清洁地
[食品] 净化器；清洁者；精炼器；精炼者
纯粹派（一个与立体派相抗衡的艺术流派）；纯粹主义；语言纯正主义
纯化论者，力求纯化的人
[化学] 纯度；纯洁；纯净；纯粹
使纯净；去除（purify的过去分词）；精炼

trans.tran_cn: 使纯净，使洁净( purify的过去式和过去分词 )
